channel.title: Region teleporting
channel.description:
So matrix based sources have regions. If you wish to use "pa" it first searches for empty area then copies tiles from existing "instance" of that pa and finally teleports you. So I wonder these things:
1. How can I teleport to those instances and see which one is intresting?
2. How can I know which is region x and which is region y for each region?

item.title: Region teleporting
item.dc:creator: @zeropointx zeropointx

So matrix based sources have regions. If you wish to use “pa” it first searches for empty area then copies tiles from existing “instance” of that pa and finally teleports you. So I wonder these things:
